description:
For the 34th meetup of Agile Connect Porto, we want our community to be the speakers and feel what it is at the other side of the stage, by facilitating a meetup with the Pecha Kucha format (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PechaKucha).

Are you crazy enough to accept this challenge? If so, please kindly submit your idea and presentation on this form so you are one of the 10 lucky ones that will have the chance to share your stories and experiences within our community!

Help us to make this a great event.
We're counting on you!

You can submit your presentation (https://bit.ly/acp34-form) proposal until 23:59 of March 12th.

The Agile Connect Porto team
name: 34th Porto Meetup - Agile Pecha Kucha Night
